title: No Lie, Pigs (and Their Houses) CAN Fly!: The Story of the Three Little Pigs as Told by the Wolf
description: He was a huffing, puffing wolf who caused the three little pigs some big-time headaches. End of story? Not quite. Get the full scoop from the wolf's point of view in this lighthearted twist on the classic fairy tale.
author: Jessica S. Gunderson
